flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A novelty badge that you can receive at the Kantonian Gym. Rumor has it that it imitates the Badge of a Gym somewhere.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A novelty badge that you can receive at the Kantonian Gym. Rumor has it that it imitates the Badge of a Gym somewhere.
